description:
The Land of Wano is in a celebratory mood now that the years of tyranny are over. However, Yamato is holding back his hunger alone until Hiyori arrives with the news he was waiting for. Meanwhile, some unknown figure approaches the Land of Wano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asa ga Kita! Luffy-tachi no Kyuusoku!
Der Morgen ist gekommen! – Ruhepause für Ruffy und seine Kameraden!
L`aube est venue. Repos mérité pour Luffy et les siens !
The Morning Comes! Luffy and the Others Rest!
بزغ الفجر! استراحة محارب استحقّها لوفي والبقيّة!
朝が来た! ルフィ達の休息!
